replies.body: Yo the coverage starts at 3.30pm AEST (4.30 for the DW first game) not 6.30pm as you have listed here.

Hey Guybrush, Dire Wolves are playing fourth not second! Full schedule is below for Day 1:
http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/worlds/world_championship_2017/schedule/play_in_groups/Day%201
Huh, gosh I feel silly now. I coulda sworn it showed DW as the second game. Nevermind me then.
Well you shouldn't! Time zones are always confusing as hell. Here's a guide to help with the first few days: http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/how-watch-worlds-play-stage-89026
